func.title: Distance

param.name: x1
param.desc: X coordinate of the first point.

param.name: y1
param.desc: Y coordinate of the first point.

param.name: x2
param.desc: X coordinate of the second point.

param.name: y2
param.desc: Y coordinate of the second point.

func.desc: Calculates the distance between two points. Same as Sqrt((x2-x1)^2 + (y2-y1)^2;).

example.code: GetCursor(0)->Message("Quick, you are only %d Clonks away from the goal!", Distance(GetX(GetCursor(0)), GetY(GetCursor(0)), 1000, 200));
example.text: Displays the distance of the clonk from point 1000/200.
